title: Font with curved serif
author: Marla White

comments.content: It looks like **[Jobbernole](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140056/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Jobbernole%20-%20Regular&fid=1c02a8b002b5be939eb21bc3c598546f&fsize=60&text=MGKINLE&fit=1)** free font by Uddi Uddi
Thank you so much!! You rock!!
